sentences.en: After digestion by plasmin, the collagen fibrillar network was destructed.
sentences.cn: 经过纤溶酶消化后, 玻璃体胶原纤维的网状结构破坏.

sentences.en: But there isnt obvious interaction between nonionic aqueous polyurethane resin and collagen.
sentences.cn: 非离子型水溶性聚氨酯与胶原间则观察不到明显的相互作用.

sentences.en: Collagen and elastin provide the strength and resiliency of connective tissues such as skin and ligaments.
sentences.cn: 胶原和弹性蛋白使象皮肤和韧带这样的结缔组织具有韧性和弹性.

sentences.en: Collagen fibers appear in the wound.
sentences.cn: 在伤口中出现了胶原纤维.

sentences.en: Contain abundant vitamin, amino acids, begonia grass, bone collagen etc. nourishment composition.
sentences.cn: 含丰富维生 、 氨基酸 、 海棠草 、 骨胶原蛋白等营养成份.

sentences.en: DDR enhance the proliferation of KFb and increase the collagen protein secretion.
sentences.cn: DDR-ASODN对KFb凋亡、增殖、胶原合成和分泌具有显著抑制作用.

sentences.en: During the first stage of wound healing, inflammation around the damaged area stimulates the production of a substance called collagen.
sentences.cn: 伤口愈合的第一个阶段，受损区域的炎症反应刺激一种叫做胶原蛋白的物质生成。

sentences.en: Function - forming and remodelling collagen, reticular and elastic fibres and the ground substances.
sentences.cn: 合成蛋白质,构成疏松结缔组织的纤维和基质成分.

sentences.en: In this chapter we briefly review the structure, biosynthesis, degradation and regulation of collagen in tissues.
sentences.cn: 在本章中我们简要地叙述组织内胶原的结构, 生物合成的 、 降鲜和调节.

sentences.en: Ingredient and function: Rosemary, Hyaloplasm acid, Collagen, Coconut oil.
sentences.cn: 成分功效: 迷迭香 、 透明质酸, 胶原蛋白, 椰子油等.

sentences.en: Ingredient: DNA Fluid, Lavender, Hamamelis, Elastic Element, Micro - collagen Protein, Hair Follicle Mollify.
sentences.cn: 主要成份: DNA原液 、 薰衣草 、 金缕梅 、 弹力素 、 微胶原蛋白 、 毛囊软化剂.

sentences.en: Ingredients: Collagen, hyaluronic acid, chrysanthemum extract serum, arbutin etc.
sentences.cn: 成份: 胶原蛋白 、 透明质酸 、 野菊花提取液 、 熊果苷等.

sentences.en: It incorporated proline directly, and hydroxylated It'subsequently in a manner reminiscent of collagen.
sentences.cn: 它直接将脯氨酸并入, 并且随后象骨胶那样使它羟基化.

sentences.en: Lemons, oranges and any other citrus fruit form collagen resulting to holding the skin cells together. It is necessary to drink fruit juices and eat fruit every day.
sentences.cn: 柠檬，橘子和任何其他柑橘类水果形成胶原蛋白，从而新生皮肤细胞组织，所以每天要多喝果汁多吃水果。

sentences.en: The collagen that is included in face creams comes from animal skin.
sentences.cn: 面霜中的胶原蛋白取自动物皮层。

sentences.en: The group of enzymes capable of degrading collagen under physiological conditions are the collagenases.
sentences.cn: 在生理条件下能降解胶原的一组酶是胶原酶.

sentences.en: The matrix of bone contains both fibers of the protein collagen and mineral deposits .
sentences.cn: 硬骨的基质既含有蛋白质的胶原纤维，也含有矿物质沉积。

sentences.en: The matrix of bone contains both fibers of the protein collagen and mineral deposits.
sentences.cn: 硬骨的基质既含有蛋白质的胶原纤维,也含有矿物质沉积.

trans.tran_en: a  protein  found in people and animals. It is often used in beauty products and treatments to make people look younger and more attractive.
